content: **the most basic toe-up sock pattern if you want to start knitting toe-up socks and/or german short row heels this one is for you ** this pattern includes instructions for * german short row heels * julia s toes * working from toe up detailed written pattern this pattern is part of my newest book **sock knitting in plain english** 1 the most comprehensive resource on sock knitting available today sock knitters unite 1 http //www jriede com/sock-knitting-plain-english/
